fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Assassinate someone each night. (Only usable once at least one recruit is dead)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, two players of opposing win conditions will become recruits. Recruits betray their original faction and instead win with the Jackal. Roles that kill themselves with their ability cannot become recruits. Roles that have guilt mechanics will no longer have that guilt. Neutral roles that do not have an NK or "see the town lose" wincon cannot become recruits.
- Each recruit knows the identity of the other, but not their roles or who the Jackal is. The Jackal knows both recruits.
- If either recruit dies, the other will commit suicide at the end of the night. They will not commit suicide if they naturally have Invincible defense or higher.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you and your recruits.
